sen.j: 南北朝時代 (日本)に美濃守護家土岐頼雄が地頭となって勢力を拡大、荘内に揖斐城を築き、自分で創建した大興寺に一部荘園を寄進するなどして接収していった。
sen.e: During the period of the Northern and Southern Courts, Yorikatsu TOKO of Mino Shugo-family (the family which produced the military governor), started to expand its control, when he became jito (land steward appointed by the central military government to each of the estates (shoen) into which the countryside was divided), and gradually took over the territory by building Ibi-jo Castle within the shoen and donating a part of the shoen (manor) to Daiko-ji Temple, which he himself erected.
sen.cmt: 美濃守護家→定訳不明：Mino Shugo-family (the family which produced the military governor)としました。
sen.e: During the period of the Northern and Southern Courts (Japan), Yorikatsu TOKO of the Mino Shugo (provincial constable of Mino Province) family became jito (manager and lord of the manor) and expanded his power before taking over the manor by constructing Ibi-jo Castle within the manor and donating part of the manor to Daiko-ji Temple which he had built.
